caption:
“I became a yoga teacher because it had such a profound impact on my life,” @villageyoga_santacruz co-founder @sallyshiels shares. “It was a way to give back.”

Staying hydrated with electrolytes is one of the ways Sally takes care of herself so she can show up for her students. But she’s seen the impact salty hydration has on her students, too. Especially after an hour practicing yoga (and sweating) at 104° F.

“Electrolytes are a huge part of being able to enjoy how you feel after yoga. If you’re completely depleted, it can actually have the opposite effect.”

LMNT has been a favorite of her students, too. “We don’t sell a lot of products, but LMNT just flies out the door. Our students love them.”
